codes¶

API¶

codes.utils.assemble_factory.build_data(para_flag_path)[source]

Description of fun. 'build_data'

This module used to create or update a large panel data file i.e. 'basic_data.parquet' and along folder './data/basic/'.

Parameters

  • para_flag_path (str) -- the file path + file name of the input file

  • 'para_flag.csv' along folder './data/para_file/' (i.e.) --

Returns

None
